name: The Billy Mays Ultimate Fighter 2
description:
He's back. Billy Mays comes to finish the job. You are Billy Mays on his journey to defeat Anthony Sullivan and his legion of evil demons. Now you are closer than ever to completing your goal of taking down Anthony Sullivan, but first you must past Zoop.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aiming

1 - Flashlight on

2 - Flashlight off

M - Cursor on/off
